975450.name: 03.04 Demo
975450.description:
The game offers you to go through the path to redemption, to get to the best place, getting rid of dissonance in your soul.


After a loud explosion, the main character wakes up in an unfamiliar place without a hint of the presence of people in the vicinity. The player has a phone that receives a message from an unknown subscriber. You have no choice but to follow the instructions sent from the "interlocutor" on your smartphone: find a way out of purgatory and atone for your sins during your lifetime to go to heaven.

The game offers you:
  • 3 game modes: Story, Hardcore (will be available in the next updates), Arena (will be available in the next updates);
  • 6 completely different locations that characterize the soul of the protagonist;
  • 2 types of firearms with excellent shooting physics and melee weapons in story mode;
  • Tons of weapons and equipment in the "Arena" mode;
  • An incredible test of your nerves in the hardcore mode. Complete the game with your bare hands!;
  • Several styles of passing the game;
  • An oppressive atmosphere that cannot be conveyed in simple words;
  • Frightening their bloodthirsty enemies.

The game was not intended to offend or offend anyone. Everything shown in "03.04" is a figment of the imagination.
All the similarities with reality are random.
